actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to increase the membership of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations by two members who shall be elected town or township officials.

summary.text: Increases the membership of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations by two members who shall be elected town or township officials.

titles.title: A bill to increase the membership of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations by two members who shall be elected town or township officials.
